mdRecord.dcterms:title: Passengers aboard a steamboat to Mount Vernon, April 20, 1922
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photographic print printed on a postcard template. Close-up view of visitors seated under the covered deck of a steamboat headed to Mount Vernon. Based on the date of the photograph, the passengers may have been traveling aboard the 'Charles Macalester.' A handwritten note on the postcard template on reverse reads: "Mrs. Page and Mother Mrs. Lester on the boat going to Mt. Vernon. Apr 20. '22"
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Steamboats
Potomac River
Visitors
